Subject: email domain not being bypassed by CAP policy
Description: We have someone trying to send a large excel document to another employee via email. Since our internal email domains are added to an allow list and that allow list is added to our content aware policies this should be bypassed an allowed. However it is still being blocked by the policy as shown in the log.
What_We_Know__c:
27Feb: Got new logs of issue after recommended steps from R&D did not work.
31Jan: Settings looked okay on the EPP server.

Email domain allowlist is not working as expected.
Next_Steps__c:
27Feb: Fix from R&D did not work. Waiting on R&D.
10Feb: Chased with customer. No status change.
31Jan: Waiting on customer to schedule a remote session with one of the end users to test this and generate some logs and also add their computers(they had the user already selected in the CAP policy) and also make sure the Outlook addin is enabled on their end.

---
A remote session will be scheduled with the customer for Monday or Tuesday.
Solution_Comment__c: Confirmed to be resolved after removing the @ symbol from the Email domain whitelist.
